title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at upper right: 448
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Circular soup tureen drawn in plan, lid surmounted by a circular finial indicated in green ink, shoulder decorated with three applied bands flanked by rectangular handles with scalloped-shaped outer edges, each mounted with two circular decorations indicated in green ink.
Elevation of this soup tureen is in the Puiforcat collection (1995-164-31).
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 448
